page.title: 04Dundrennan Playing Field
page.content: Next to Dundrennan Abbey is a large field, which is owned by the Community Council.It is used for a football pitch, a childrens play area, and is used by the school for games. The Community Council erected swings,a slide, monkey bars and tyres, which are used by local children as well as visitors. The local football club put up goal posts and nets, and levelled and enlarged the pitch. The football club train on a Tuesday night, and use the pitch about twelve times a year for league matches.Regularly on Saturday evening the juniors play a nearby village. An annual 5 a side tournament is played. This August a fete is to be held by the Community Council,and some of the proceeds will be used to improve the children's play area.
